rules_text: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -6/-0 until your next turn.
special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature attacks you or a permanent you protect, that creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
[0]: Draw a card. Each player loses 1 life.
[-4]: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
